song_lyrics: Haḷve haḷve haḷve Harajī māre mandir āvyā re,
Monghe monghe monghe me to motīḍe vadhāvyā re... ° 1
Kīdhu kīdhu kīdhu mujne kāīk kāmaṇ kīdhu re,
Līdhu līdhu līdhu māru chittaḍu chorī līdhu re... ° 2
Jāgī jāgī jāgī hu to Harimukh jovā jāgī re,
Bhāgī bhāgī bhāgī mārā bhavnī bhāvaṭ bhāgī re... ° 3
Fūlī fūlī fūlī hu to Harimukh joīne fūlī re,
Bhūlī bhūlī bhūlī mārā gharno dhandho bhūlī re... ° 4
Pāmī pāmī pāmī hu to mahāpadvīne pāmī re,
Maḷiyo maḷiyo maḷiyo Mahetā Narasaiyāno Swāmī re... ° 5
title: Haḷve haḷve haḷve Harajī māre mandir āvyā re

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-282: Narsinha Mehta

Category: Anya Gujarati Pad
